title: bArO namma
sahitya:
bArO namma manege gOpAlakrSNa


caraNam 1    golla bAlakaranu nillisi hogalEri gullu mADade mosarella savida krSNa
    caraNam 2    kastUri tilakava nistAgi phaNeyaliTTu mastAgi kuNiva paravastu kANEnendu
    caraNam 3    mujjagavanella bojjeyoLageyiTTu gejjeya kaTTi tappu hejjeya nikkuta
    caraNam 4    nAriyaru bicciTTa sIregaLa nuidu mereyillade kaiya tOrenda shrI krSNa
    caraNam 5    anganeyara vrta bhangava mADida ranga viTTala bhavabhanga pariharisO
